name: Bengal Tiger
description: A fearsome predator weighing up to 325kg, you wouldn't want to mess with one!

name: Giant Panda
description: A peaceful and widely adored animal that is native to south central China.

name: Eastern Gorilla
description: Gorillas live in groups called troops and are closely related to humans.

name: Amur Leopard
description: This feline is incredibly rare, it is said only about 60 exist in the wild today.

name: Chimpanzee
description: Chimpanzees are the closest living relative of humans along with the Bonobo.

name: Black Panther
description: The black panther is actually a genetic variation of leopard and jaguar.

name: Elephant
description: Elephants really do have a remarkable memory, it's not just a myth!

name: Orangutan
description: An orangutan's arms are longer and stronger than its legs, reaching up to 2 metres.
